nodes.text: Jason McGatlin is Executive Vice President of Physical Production at Lucasfilm Ltd. He has executive produced the films Star Wars: The Force Awakens, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Star Wars: The Last Jedi,, Solo: A Star Wars Story, and Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker.
McGatlin has previously worked on such films as War of the Worlds (2005) and The Adventures of Tintin (2011).
He is also one of the members of the Intellectual Property Development Group.
